issue.name: Cross-site scripting (reflected)
issue.issueBackground: Reflected cross-site scripting vulnerabilities arise when data is copied from a request and echoed into the application's response in an unsafe way.

issue.name: SQL Injection
issue.issueBackground: SQL injection vulnerabilities arise when user-controllable data is incorporated into SQL queries without sufficient validation or escaping.

issue.name: Insecure Cookie Without Secure Flag
issue.issueBackground: Cookies transmitted over unencrypted connections can be intercepted by an attacker.
